name: The Prophetic Generation - Fearless & Uncompromising
description:
Man shall not live by bread alone; but man lives by every word that proceeds from the mouth of the LORD. (Deut. 8:3)

As the world grows darker, God is raising up a generation that is in tune with His voice and empowered by His Spirit to release supernatural transformation by declaring His Word. 
Are you tired of dry, dead religion?
Do you desire to hear God’s voice in a fresh new way?
Ever wondered if things should actually be happening when you pray?

The hour that you live in does not call for passive Christianity, but an assembly of warriors determined to walk in victory over every strategy of the enemy. 
The Prophetic Generation activates you to:
•        Prophesy in proportion to your faith
•        Recognize God’s voice and declare what He is saying
•        Walk in multi-generational blessing and start a prophetic   legacy
•        Engage in victorious spiritual warfare using prophetic weaponry

Take your place in this prophetic generation and usher in the greatest harvest in history!

name: The Joshua Generation - 4 Disc Set
description:
The book of Joshua is a powerful and fascinating historical account of Israel's conquest and possession of their promised lands; but if we by the Spirit look deeper, we will discover diving principles and strategies for today. Everyone has a promised land of call and destiny for their lives; however, the key is understanding God's ways as He leads us into our full purpose.

Dr. Tim Bagwell powerfully reveals how to leave the place of maintenance and enter into God's will of overflow.  These messages show how the book of Joshuah is a prophetic oracle to the end time church and a blueprint to possessing your prophetic promise.

name: Overcoming Obstacles - 3 CD Disc Set
description:
Since the steps of the believer are truly ordered of the Lord, it is understandable that the enemy strategically places obstacles to detour, delay, or even destroy our destiny.  In his most recent series, Overcoming Obstacles, God uses Dr. Tim Bagwell to reveal how you can move your mountains!

Dr. Bagwell details the scriptures’ use of obstacles such as oceans, rivers, mountains, and walls and shares real-life applications to help us overcome every attempt by the enemy to get us to runaway or give up on our destiny.  After hearing this series, you will identify and pick up your rod, embrace the mantle that is around you, and rejoice that the throne of His presence is active in your day to day walk.

name: The 300 An Elite Fighting Force - 4 CD Disc Set
description:
In this four-part series, Dr. Tim Bagwell strategically uses the characteristics and virtues of Gideon’s 300 to challenge YOU to take on the nature of vigilance, fearlessness, and submission in order to be the elite warrior God has ordained YOU to be. 

God is doing something supernatural and NOW is the time to tap in to your destined position in the Kingdom! “There needs to be, in the spirit realm, a 300.” 

Hear the call! Accept the challenge! Be one of the 300 in these last days!

Judges 7:7 KJV
“And the LORD said unto Gideon, By the three 
hundred men…will I save you, and deliver the 
Midianites into thine hand…”

name: The Redeemed Unveiling The Mystery of Redemtion - 4 CD Disc Set
description:
Redemption is fundamental to the Christian walk, but yet a majority of Christians do not fully understand this.  We have heard the terms restoration, atonement, remission, reconciliation, justification, salvation, and regeneration, but do we really understand the power behind these words?  A revelation of these familiar terms can dramatically and radically change the way we move and function in our individual walk and collectively as the church!

In this series, Dr. Tim Bagwell delivers a fresh and explosive revelation of the power of “The Redeemed.”   As a premiere, prophetic voice of today, Dr. Bagwell will give you new insight into what we should know regarding this all-important foundation and how to walk with boldness and confidence, because we are truly “THE REDEEMED!”

name: Nehemiah 52 The Architecture For Restoration - 5 CD Disc Set
description:
THE ARCHITECTURE FOR RESTORATION is clearly illustrated through the life of Nehemiah. Nehemiah is informed that Jerusalem is without walls and resolves to rebuild them. The king appoints him as governor of Judah and grants him leave from Susa to Jerusalem. There he rebuilds the walls in 52 days, despite the opposition of Israel's enemies.  

How could one man gain the influence of a king to restore a nation?  

In this snapshot of Nehemiah’s journey, Dr. Tim Bagwell unlocks insight concerning our walls, gates and altars. Through this series we can glean how favor and focus will enable us to restore our lives, family and neighborhoods.   

You may be the Nehemiah of your family, community, or city.

name: Dr. Tim Bagwell Returns To The Potters House - DVD
description:
Dr. Tim Bagwell 
was recently invited back  to minister at The Potter’s House in Dallas, Texas, a 30,000 member church pastored by Bishop TD Jakes. Experience the presence of God as he ministers a timeless message that all believers need to hear, “Encouraging Yourself 
in the Lord.”

name: Activate - 4 CD Disc Set
description:
Do you have unanswered prayers?  Unfulfilled promises?  Sometimes it can be a challenge to stand firm as we continue to wait for our prayers come 
to pass.

In this four-part series, Dr. Tim Bagwell challenges you to believe God for the miraculous, and shows you how to activate prophetic fulfillment, answers, and overflow for your life.  What you see versus what God wants you to see are critical for activating the power of God in all situations.  

Beginning with a message entitled "Faith Focus”, Dr. Bagwell defines important principles that will activate you to apprehend what God has 
for your life

name: The Drought is Broken at The Potter's House - DVD
description: The challenging of our current economy have given us cause for great concern and have left many in panic, fear, and worry. However, the prophetic word of the Lord has been declared, "The Drought Is Broken!" As you watch this DVD, in his second appearance at the Potters House, you will learn the 7 keys to breaking the drought and releasing a downpour of blessing.

name: When I See the Blood
description:
Why is it that modern-day Christians have chosen to virtually ignore the message of the blood of Christ?
 
Why is it that this all-important theme is not being preached more, sung more, and taught more than these days?
 
Could it be that the enemy of our souls is trying to silence a message that is most important to the welfare of our souls and our continuing victory as Christians?
 
With convincing authority, Dr. Tim Bagwell, declares that the old-age message of the blood is still valid for our time and that many of the false doctrines that have invaded the church today have come about because we lack the revelation regarding the foundational truth.
 
Forward by Dr. Oral Roberts:
 
I am honored to write a personal word about my dear friend, Tim Bagwell, and his terrific new book, When I See the Blood.  A thrill went through me as I realized anew by reading Tim's precious words that I am covered by the blood of my personal Savior, Jesus Christ of Nazareth.  I thought to myself: Every believer needs this powerful reminder!
   
Knowing Tim Bagwell, his lovely wife, Gayla, and his sons, Adam and Aaron, and ministering in their church in Denver has made me realize that he is a great man with an anointed church.  I love those dear saints. In so many ways they reflect Tim's anointed ministry, his scholarly insights into God's Word and his passionate love and vision.  His people are presently at work building a new and larger sanctuary to accommodate there explosive growth.  That's what happens when a man is on fire for God.
   
Tim's new book inspires me and I believe it will do the same for you.

name: Dr. Tim Bagwell at The Potter's House - DVD
description: Dr. Tim Bagwell was invited by Bishop T.D. Jakes to minister at the 30,000 member Potter's House in Dallas, Texas.  This DVD captures the Holy Ghost charged atmosphere of this life-changing service.  The message and personal ministry will encourage you and elevate your faith to believe God for breakthroughs in your life.

name: The Blood - An In-Depth Teaching on the Blood of Christ - 5 Disc CD Set
description:
Available in CD format - $20.00

    virtually  ignore the message of the blood of Christ?

•  Why is it that this all-important theme is not being 
    preached more, sung more, and taught more these days?
 
•  Could it be that the enemy of our souls is trying to silence 
    a message that is most important to the welfare of our 
    souls  and our continuing victory as Christians?

With convincing authority, Dr. Tim Bagwell, declares that the 
age-old message of the blood is still valid for our time and 
that many of the false doctrines that have invaded the 
church today have come about because we lack revelation 
regarding this foundational truth.  

Revealing and Compelling!

Revealing and Compelling!

name: Shine Magazine - 6th Edition
description: (Brown)

name: Speak Lord - CD
description: “Speak Lord” is a high energy, deep worship, musically expressive project that has already been drawing in thousands of people into the presence of God. Having his background in gospel and rock music, Aaron has written all the songs on “Speak Lord” composing a unique blend of style creating an original sound that will surely bless your life. Before every recording session, the band and singers prayed for at least an hour to usher in the presence of God and capture God's anointing on this album. If you need an encounter with the Holy Spirit, then listen and draw into His presence through “Speak Lord”.

name: Empowered for Life
description:
"Too often the spiritual people among us seem to have lost the practical skills they need to be successful in life, and the practical people among us seem not to possess the spiritual virtues that would bring them ultimate success.  Joseph had it all; incredible brilliance, supernatural giftedness, impeccable character and uncompromising holiness.  He was the type of man that we should all aspire to be.  He was truly living day by day in the anointing.  This is not just another narrative of the life of Joseph.  I consider him to be the ultimate prototype for the anointed, empowered lifestyle."
                                                                        - Dr. Tim Bagwell

name: Possessing Your Prophetic Promise
description:
At a time when the church has been blessed by the greatest period of expository teaching of the Word of God that any generation has experienced, at a time when we have more resources available to us than ever before, why do many of God's people seem to wander for years in the wilderness without ever experiencing a breakthrough into the fullness of what God has promised to them?  Why have so many received miraculous provision and protection but still have not scratched the surface of their spiritual potential?  It is time to possess our prophetic promises.

But what must we do to cross over the river Jordan and possess our Promise Land?  What steps are necessary to dislodge every enemy and take back what is rightfully ours? As only he can, Dr. Tim Bagwell brings forth the revelation that God has given him to bring YOU to the place of Possessing Your Prophetic Promise.

name: Shine Magazine - 5th Edition
description: (Multi-color)

name: Shine Magazine -  4th Edition
description: (Purple)

name: Shine Magazine - 3rd Edition
description: (Pink)

name: Shine Magazine - 1st Edition
description: (Yellow)

name: Releasing the Divine Nature - 8 Disc Set
description: We have to learn how to soar with the eagles, despise mediocrity, and refuse to settle for being average in life.  Excellence must become part of our daily routine.  An excellent spirit will releases favor into our lives.  Excellence is not perfection but progression towards what God wants us to become in this life.

name: The Cross - 2 Disc CD Set
description:
Did you know you have a personal cross?

The Word declares in Matthew 16:24-25 “ Then said Jesus unto his disciples, if any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me. For whosoever will save his life shall lose it: and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it.” (KJV)

In this dynamic series Dr. Tim Bagwell reveals the power in accepting the Divine calling that the Lord has for your life. “Jesus of Nazareth King of the Jews” was written over Jesus’ cross. Do you know what is written over your cross? There is something that has been written over you life; there is a Holy Ghost sovereignty scripted I.D. and destiny that God has declared over your life.
